field.div: I am very pleased to announce that your new service(s) is now live.
field.p: Attached is your Support Guide with full details of your new service(s) and an explanation of how to log trouble tickets via BSO Service Desk.

To ensure you are confident that your service is working as expected, your service delivery team remains at your disposal for any activation queries over the next 5 working days. If we don’t hear from you within that time, we presume that you’re happy your service is correctly installed and functioning properly.
We are continuing to work hard to improve our customer service, if you have any feedback on the delivery process, please do let me know.
Thank you for your order and I look forward to our continued work together.
